author: Author
add post attachment description: Add <0>{{ attachmentType }}</0> to post <1>{{ postId }}</1> on subspace <2>{{ subspaceId }}</2>

delete post description: <0/> delete post <1>{{ postId }}</1> on subspace <2>{{ subspaceId }}</2>
edit post description: <0/> edit post <1>{{ postId }}</1> on subspace <2>{{ subspaceId }}</2>
